p: The World Health Organization has recommended against routinely administering systemic corticosteroids to patients with COVID‐19. 18 Nevertheless, a consensus statement by the Chinese Thoracic Society recommends using corticosteroids, albeit prudently, 19 ideally in the context of a randomised controlled trial. To undertake such a trial during an ongoing epidemic is challenging. To facilitate study design, we report the impact of corticosteroid therapy in patients with COVID‐19 according to accumulated observational clinical data.
